title: Question about Worlds Master Pass
body: When i buy Worlds Master Pass ex: oct 6. will i still get all the missions that i would if i bought it earlier??

replies.body: You'll have missions from the week you purchased the missions and those moving forward.  You won't be able to do week 1 missions, but the price of the pass reduces as well.  Keep an eye on the mission expiration so you finish them in time!
